h3.b: WAIVER WITH SPECIAL POWER OF ATTORNEY

div.p:

td.p: For hospitalization refunds due to accidents: ten percent (10%) of the full amount reimbursed by the insurance company shall be retained by EMPLOYER as service fee, and the balance shall be turned-over to the undersigned; and

For death, either natural or by accident: fifty percent (50%) of the full insurance proceeds shall go to my heirs and survivors, and fifty percent (50%) will be retained by EMPLOYER as service fee and compensation for the sudden loss of a valued employee.
